attributes.action: Demand Cameron admits airstrikes in Syria contradict the views of the majority.
attributes.background: A decision to carry out airstrikes in Syria was taken despite overwhelming opposition from the general public. We demand the government admits the airstrikes contradict the views of the majority and apologise for making the decision without properly consulting the public.

rejection.details:
If you would like the Government to test the opinion of the public by holding a referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113150
